trans-unit.source: Represents a connection point that is displayed on the outer edges of an activity designer on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Representerer et connection point som vises på ytre kantene på en Aktivitetsdesigner på en arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A connection point appears as a small square on the edge of an activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Et connection point vises som en liten firkant på side av en aktivitet utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: It is used as a point where a Connector can originate on the activity designer to connect it with another activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Den brukes som et punkt der en kobling kan komme på aktiviteten utformeren for å koble den til en annen Aktivitetsdesigner.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> class by using the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>, <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges"></xref> enumeration value, and an integer.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> klassen ved hjelp av den angitte <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges"> </xref> opplistingsverdien og et heltall.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to which the connection point belongs.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> som tilkoblingspunktet tilhører.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges"></xref> enumeration value that specifies where on the activity designer the connection point is located.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges"> </xref> opplistingsverdi som angir hvor Aktivitetsdesigner tilkoblingspunktet befinner seg.

trans-unit.source: An index location of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En indekseringsplassering for gjeldende <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: connectionIndex is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: connectionIndexer mindre enn null.

trans-unit.source: -- or -- connectionIndex is greater than or equal to the number of connection points on associatedDesigner.
trans-unit.target: -- eller-- connectionIndex er større enn eller lik antallet punkt tilkoblingen på associatedDesigner.

trans-unit.source: associatedDesigner contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: associatedDesignerinneholder en nullreferanse ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets the activity designer to which the connection point belongs.
trans-unit.target: Henter Aktivitetsdesigner tilkoblingspunktet tilhører.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to which the connection point belongs.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> som tilkoblingspunktet tilhører.

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounding rectangle for the connection point.
trans-unit.target: Henter det avgrensende rektangelet for tilkoblingspunktet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that bounds the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som grensene i <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer edge on which the connection point appears.
trans-unit.target: Henter designer kanten som tilkoblingspunktet vises.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges"></xref> that specifies the activity designer edge on which the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> appears.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges"> </xref> som angir aktiviteten designer kanten som den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> vises.

trans-unit.source: Gets the connection index for the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter tilkoblingen indeksen for gjeldende <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An activity designer uses ConnectionIndex to identify a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> in the read-only <xref:System.Drawing.Point> collection returned by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.GetConnections%2A>.
trans-unit.target: En Aktivitetsdesigner bruker ConnectionIndex til å identifisere en <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint>i den skrivebeskyttede <xref:System.Drawing.Point>samlingen ble returnert av <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.GetConnections%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.GetConnections%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Point> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint>

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the connection index for the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Et heltall som representerer tilkoblingen indeksen for gjeldende <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> is equal to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en verdi som angir om gjeldende <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> er lik det angitte objektet.

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som skal sammenlignes med gjeldende <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: to indicate that the current and obj are equal; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: å angi at gjeldende og obj er lik; ellers, .

trans-unit.source: Returns a hash code for the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en hash-kode for gjeldende <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The hash code generated by the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.ConnectionIndex*> integer or the designer available through <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.AssociatedDesigner*>.
trans-unit.target: Hashkoden som genereres av den <> </> *> heltall eller designer tilgjengelig gjennom <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a point that represents the logical location of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> on the associated <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter punkt som representerer logiske plasseringen for den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> for den tilknyttede <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that represents the logical location of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> on the associated <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> som representerer logiske plasseringen for den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> for den tilknyttede <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Performs all tasks required to render the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> on the activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Utfører alle oppgaver som kreves for å vise den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> på aktiviteten utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the data
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder dataene

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to draw a highlighted connection point; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>til å tegne et merkede connection point; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
